remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空間會公開物件表示的所有控制項和使用者介面 (UI) 項目所支援的視覺化樣式。The namespace exposes objects that represent all of the controls and user interface (UI) elements that are supported by visual styles. 若要繪製或取得特定的項目相關資訊，您必須設定您感興趣的項目。To draw or get information about a particular element, you must set a to the element you are interested in. A會自動設定為指定中建構函式，但您也可以設定的現有至不同的項目，藉由呼叫方法。A is automatically set to a specified in the constructor, but you can also set an existing to a different element by calling the method. 若要繪製項目，請使用方法。To draw an element, use the method. 類別也包含方法，例如和，可提供有關如何將項目定義的目前視覺化樣式資訊。The class also includes methods, such as and , that provide information about how an element is defined by the current visual style. 建構函式和許多方法擲回例外狀況，除非已在作業系統中啟用視覺化樣式和視覺化樣式套用至應用程式視窗的工作區。The constructor and many of the methods throw exceptions unless visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows. 若要檢查這些條件，請使用`static`屬性。To check for these conditions, use the `static` property. 類別會包裝的視覺化樣式 (UxTheme) API 的 Windows 平台 sdk 的 Windows Shell 部分的功能。The class wraps the functionality of the visual styles (UxTheme) API from the Windows Shell portion of the Windows Platform SDK. 視覺化樣式的詳細資訊，請參閱 < 使用 Windows XP 視覺化樣式 >，MSDN Library 的 Platform SDK 部分[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/)。For more information about visual styles, see "Using Windows XP Visual Styles" in the Platform SDK portion of the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用來實作自訂控制項，以模擬一些基本的 UI，包括使用標題列拖曳、 調整大小與縮放控點，並關閉視窗的類別。The following code example uses the class to implement a custom control that simulates some of the basic UI of a window, including dragging with the title bar, resizing with the sizing handle, and closing. 這個範例會使用數個物件，代表標準的組件的視窗中，包括所公開的項目， ，和類別。This example uses several objects that represent standard parts of a window, including the elements exposed by the , , and classes. remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表描述的三個條件必須存在的每個個別檢查屬性，以傳回`true`。The following table describes how to individually check for each of the three conditions that must exist for the property to return `true`. |條件Condition|如何判斷個別How to determine separately| |---------------|---------------------------------| |作業系統支援視覺化樣式。The operating system supports visual styles.|確認的屬性類別是`true`。Verify that the property of the class is `true`.| |使用者已經啟用作業系統中的視覺化樣式。The user has enabled visual styles in the operating system.|確認的屬性類別是`true`。Verify that the property of the class is `true`.| |正在使用視覺化樣式來繪製應用程式視窗的工作區。Visual styles are being used to draw the client area of application windows.|確認的屬性類別具有值或。Verify that the property of the class has the value or .|
